Acecarbromal (INN) (aha aha Sedamyl, Abasin, Carbased, Paxarel, Sedacetyl, ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ), nke a makwaara dị ka acetylcarbromel na acetyladalin, bụ ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị ma na-emebi ureide (acylurea) nke Bayer chọpụtara na 1917 nke a na-ere na United States na Europe. A na-ejikwa ya na ngwakọta nke quebracho na vitamin E dị ka ọgwụgwọ maka dysfunction na eme Ihe ziri ezi ntụziaka oriri ụkwụ erectile n'okpuru aha Afrodor na Europe. Acecarbromal nwere njikọ na barbiturates, nke bụ ureas cyclized. A naghị atụ aro iji ya mee ihe ogologo oge n'ihi na ọ nwere ike ịkpata nsị bromine.
